short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes LinkedIn posts containing specific keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you find your LinkedIn feed cluttered with posts that are irrelevant or distracting? Take control of your LinkedIn experience with LinkedIn Feed Filter - Custom Keyword Blocker. 

This extension allows you to personalize your feed by blocking posts that contain keywords you specify, ensuring you see only the content that matters to you.

• Key Features:

Customizable Keyword Filtering: Easily add or remove keywords to filter out posts that you find distracting or irrelevant.

Real-time Feed Update: Your feed updates instantly as you add or remove keywords, providing a seamless and personalized browsing experience.

User-friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design allows you to manage your keywords effortlessly.

Dynamic Content Filtering: Automatically detects and filters new posts as they load in your feed.
Privacy-focused: All processing happens locally on your device. Your keywords and browsing data are never shared.

• How It Works:

Add Keywords: Enter the keywords you want to block in the extension's popup window.

Automatic Filtering: The extension scans your LinkedIn feed and hides posts containing the specified keywords.

Real-time Adjustments: Add or remove keywords anytime, and see your feed update instantly.

Seamless Experience: Enjoy a clean and focused LinkedIn feed tailored to your preferences.

• Why Choose LinkedIn Feed Filter - Custom Keyword Blocker?:

Stay Focused: Eliminate distractions and focus on the content that matters to you.
Increase Productivity: Spend less time scrolling through irrelevant posts and more time engaging with valuable content.

Personalized Browsing: Tailor your LinkedIn feed to suit your interests and professional goals.

• Get Started:

Install the LinkedIn Feed Filter - Custom Keyword Blocker extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.

Add your desired keywords and enjoy a cleaner, more relevant LinkedIn feed.

Enhance your LinkedIn experience today with LinkedIn Feed Filter - Custom Keyword Blocker. 
Stay focused, stay productive, and take control of your feed
